name: Cook's Assistant
steps: Talk to the Cook in Lumbridge Castle kitchen
Obtain an egg, flour, and milk
Egg: Get from chickens near Lumbridge
Flour: Wheat from field north of Lumbridge, grind at mill
Milk: Use bucket on dairy cow near Lumbridge
Return to the Cook with all ingredients

name: Dragon Slayer I
steps: Talk to the Guildmaster in the Champions' Guild
Collect three map pieces from Wormbrain, Melzar, and oracle
Visit Oziach in Edgeville
Obtain anti-dragon shield
Board ship to Crandor
Navigate through underground passage
Defeat Elvarg the dragon (level 83)

name: Monkey Madness I
steps: Talk to King Narnode Shareen in the Grand Tree
Prepare inventory with required items
Travel to Ape Atoll
Complete the underground caverns
Defeat the Jungle Demon
Return to King Narnode

name: Recipe for Disaster
steps: Start by talking to the Cook in Lumbridge Castle
Complete all 10 subquests to free each council member
Defeat the Culinaromancer in final battle
Claim your rewards from the chest

name: Waterfall Quest
steps: Talk to Almera in her house east of the Fight Arena
Obtain a rope and glarial's amulet
Enter Glarial's Tomb
Navigate the waterfall dungeon
Solve the boulder puzzle
Claim treasure from the chest
